OOC: Oh boy a whole army to fight against......

::FireBlade::
FireBlade got nialed by 10 of the shots by Tiger hawk making him
stagger back on every one he whipped around to see a grenade and two
missiles coming at him. He whipped up his sword an shot a blast of
fire blowing htem up before they got to him but Cheetors green blast
hit him in the chest and blew his armour away there knocking him down...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., icedemon101@h... wrote:
> [ok I will have to post differently.]
>
>
> Tigerhawk/Rhinox/Cheetor/Silverbolt
>
>
>
> They all ran out the cf and started attacking Fireblade. Tigerhawk
> fired 25 bullets at Fireblade. Rhinox threw a gernade at Fireblade.
> Cheetor put his blades together and fired a green blast at Fireblade.
> Silverbolt threw two missles at Fireblade.
